response.message: Overall great interview. It's intriguing hearing more of the inner details about the VC-hunt and what your guys' experiences were with that. If Joel is looking for another book topic to write on, the conception, rapid growth, and immense success of a certain online company would be a great subject.

a bit more coverage, we are the "Deal of the Week" on This Week in Venture Capital:

http://thisweekin.com/thisweekin-venture-capital/twivc-06-with-jason-calacanis/
